subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
;“not have; not”
:From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ma|t=not}}. Cognate with {{och-l|亡}}, with an [[w:Old Chinese|Old Chinese]] auxiliary verb derivative suffix *-ʔ.
